oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Former Union Avenue Methodist Church
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Union Avenue; Cooper Street; Union Avenue United Methodist Church; churches; 2010s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photo of the former Union Avenue Church of Christ, at the corner of Union Avenue and Cooper Street. The Church, built in 1914, was demolished in 2011. A giant inflatable pumpkin is pictured across Cooper in the Ike's parking lot.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lanier, Robert
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Robert Lanier; Manuscript collection processed by Victoria Grey;
